ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CAPITAL COST ALLOWANCE- 2008 AND 2009 BUDGET MEASURES) which concern changes to the capital cost allowance (CCA) regime announced in the 2008 Budget Plan (other than proposals concerning Class 43.1 and Class 43.2 property) and the 2009 Budget Plan.
